channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024120713
item.description:

item.title: Report E-2024120242
item.description:
Report E-2024120242

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-14
  • City: FIFE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-UTA called in to report a spill of an unknown amount of UN 1993 "CITRUS CLEAN DEGREASER" from 2 5-gallon metal pails released due to an unknown cause. The caller declined to provide an estimate for the amount of material released and stated that the spill was originally discovered at a customer location but that there was no material to clean at the customer location or on the trailer that transported it. The spill is primarily to the cardboard that the pails were shipped in. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who confirmed they were comfortable cleaning the spill with PPE per the SDS.
